p.d: Rick Astley’s distinctively rich vocals is the star of the show in this performance set in a Berlin club. Get ready to go down memory lane with the unforgettable hit “Never Gonna Give You Up,” and other catchy songs. Berlin Live presents some of the world’s most talented musicians, as they perform in front of an intimate audience at an exotic club in Berlin. Featuring concerts from contemporary to classic, each show offers a diverse mix of music to audiences all over the world. Featuring : Rick Astley.
